zh_CN.name: 简体中文
zh_CN.help: 🐱 欢迎使用 Catbox Uploader！ 本机器人可以将您发送的文件上传到 Catbox 或 Litterbox，并返回文件的分享链接。 单文件限制 20 MB。上传的文件不得违反 Catbox ToS 以及 Litterbox ToS。 命令列表： /help - 显示帮助信息 /settings - 设置语言、存储服务、文件有效时长 /upload -（群组中）回复一条带文件的消息以上传 网络资源分享频道： @atashare Bot 更新频道：@atabots Bot 源码：GitHub
zh_CN.uploading: 文件下载完成，正在上传到 {s}...
zh_CN.uploaded: 上传完成！文件链接（有效时长 {s}）👇
zh_CN.flood_protection: 请先等待当前文件上传完成。
zh_CN.langSetText: √ 已设置为简体中文。发送 /help 看看我能做什么！
zh_CN.err_FileTooBig: 文件过大（> 20 MB），超出 Bot API 限制！
zh_CN.settings_setLitterBoxExpr: 设置 Litterbox 文件有效时长
zh_CN.fileNotDetected: 回复的消息中未发现可上传的文件。

en_US.name: English
en_US.help: 🐱 Welcome to Catbox Uploader! This bot can upload your files to Catbox or Litterbox, and return the file's share link. Single file limit 20 MB (Bot API). The files you uploaded mustn't violate the Catbox ToS and Litterbox ToS. Commands: /help - Send this help info /settings - Choose a language, service or file expiration. /upload - (in groups) Reply to a message with file to upload. Take a look at my channel @atashare and @atabots for interesting websites and update notes! Source Code：GitHub
en_US.uploading: File downloaded successfully. Now uploading to {s}...
en_US.flood_protection: Please wait for the current file to finish uploading.
en_US.langSetText: √ Language set to English. Send /help to see what I can do!
en_US.err_FileTooBig: File too big (> 20 MB)，exceeds Bot API limit!
en_US.fileNotDetected: No uploadable file detected in the message.
